    • Uses of IComponent in components.audio

      Classes in components.audio that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AudioListenerComponent
      The scene's audio listener and it's position, orientation and velocity affects how we hear audio sources' sounds.
      class  AudioSourceComponent
      Audio sources can emit sounds.

    • Uses of IComponent in components.camera

      Subinterfaces of IComponent in components.camera 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Camera
      Base interface for Components with camera features.
      Classes in components.camera that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CameraComponent
      Implements basic camera functions.

    • Uses of IComponent in components.environmentProbes

      Classes in components.environmentProbes that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicEnvironmentProbeComponent
      Stores a DynamicEnvironmentProbe.
      class  EnvironmentProbeComponent<T extends EnvironmentProbe>
      Base class which contains an EnvironmentProbe.
      class  StaticEnvironmentProbeComponent
      Stores a StaticEnvironmentProbe.

    • Uses of IComponent in components.light

      Classes in components.light that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a directional light source.
      class  BlinnPhongLightComponent
      This abstract class stores the light's diffuse, specular and ambient components.
      class  BlinnPhongPointLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a point light source.
      class  BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a spot light source.

    • Uses of IComponent in components.light.lightTypes

      Subinterfaces of IComponent in components.light.lightTypes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BlinnPhongDirectionalLight
      This interface signs that the Component is a Blinn-Phong directional light source.
      interface  BlinnPhongLight
      This interface signs that the Component is a Blinn-Phong light source.
      interface  BlinnPhongPointLight
      This interface signs that the Component is a Blinn-Phong point light source.
      interface  BlinnPhongSpotLight
      This interface signs that the Component is a Blinn-Phong spot light source.

    • Uses of IComponent in components.renderables

      Classes in components.renderables that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MeshComponent
      Contains a Mesh what you can render.
      class  RenderableComponent<T extends Renderable>
      Contains a Renderable what you can render.
      class  SplineComponent
      Contains a Spline what you van render or can be used as a path of an object.

    • Uses of IComponent in core

      Classes in core that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Component
      All of a GameObject's Components based on this abstract class.

    • Uses of IComponent in examples

      Classes in examples that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FreeCameraComponent
      This class extends the DefaultCameraComponent and allows the user to control the camera movement and rotation by the keyboard.
